6    | 
7    | #ifndef FALSE
8    | #define FALSE 0
9    | #define TRUE  !FALSE
10   | #endif
11   | 
12   | /*--- Prototypes  */
13   | int key_pressed(void);
14   | unsigned int waitkey(void);
15   | unsigned char shift_status(void);
16   | int is_fkey(unsigned int scancode);
17   | 
18   | /*---------------------
19   |   Character constants
20   | ----------------------*/
21   | #define  BELL  '\a'
22   | #define  CR    13
23   | #define  LF    10
24   | #define  ESC   27
25   | #define  STX    2
26   | #define  ETX    3
27   | #define  SPACE ' '
28   | #define  COMMA ','
29   | #define  HT     5       /* Horizontal TAB */
30   | 
31   | /*---------------
32   |   KEY CONSTANTS
33   | ----------------*/
34   | #define ESC_KEY		  0x011B
35   | #define ARROW_UP      0x48E0  /* 0x4800 */
36   | #define ARROW_DOWN    0x50E0  /* 0x5000 */
37   | #define ARROW_LEFT    0x4BE0  /* 0x4B00 */
38   | #define ARROW_RIGHT   0x4DE0  /* 0x4D00 */
39   | #define PAGE_UP       0x49e0  /* 0x4900 */
40   | #define PAGE_DOWN     0x51e0  /* 0x5100 */
41   | #define DELETE        0x53e0  /* 0x5300 */
42   | #define BACKSPACE     0x0E08
43   | #define HOME          0x47e0  /* 0x4700 */
44   | #define END_LINE      0x4fe0  /* 0x4F00 */
45   | #define ENTER		  0x1C0D
46   | #define RETURN		  0x1C0D
47   | 
48   | /*--- Shift status, as returned by bioskey(2)  */
49   | #define RIGHT_SHIFT   0x01
50   | #define LEFT_SHIFT    0x02
51   | #define CONTROL       0x04
52   | #define ALTERNATE     0x08
53   | #define SCROLL_LOCK   0x10
54   | #define NUM_LOCK      0x20
55   | #define CAPS_LOCK     0x40
56   | #define INSERT_ACTIVE 0x80
57   | 
58   | /*--- Function key scancodes, as returned by bioskey(1)  */
59   | 
60   | #define F1          0x3B00    
61   | #define F2          0x3C00    
62   | #define F3          0x3D00    
63   | #define F4          0x3E00    
64   | #define F5          0x3F00    
65   | #define F6          0x4000    
66   | #define F7          0x4100    
67   | #define F8          0x4200    
68   | #define F9          0x4300    
69   | #define F10         0x4400    
70   | #define F11         0x8500    
71   | #define F12         0x8600    
72   | 					      
73   | #define SHIFT_F1    0x5400
74   | #define SHIFT_F2    0x5500
75   | #define SHIFT_F3    0x5600
76   | #define SHIFT_F4    0x5700
77   | #define SHIFT_F5    0x5800
78   | #define SHIFT_F6    0x5900
79   | #define SHIFT_F7    0x5A00
80   | #define SHIFT_F8    0x5B00
81   | #define SHIFT_F9    0x5C00
82   | #define SHIFT_F10   0x5D00
83   | #define SHIFT_F11   0x8700
84   | #define SHIFT_F12   0x8800
85   | 					      
86   | #define CTRL_F1     0x5E00
87   | #define CTRL_F2     0x5F00
88   | #define CTRL_F3     0x6000
89   | #define CTRL_F4     0x6100
90   | #define CTRL_F5     0x6200
91   | #define CTRL_F6     0x6300
92   | #define CTRL_F7     0x6400
93   | #define CTRL_F8     0x6500
94   | #define CTRL_F9     0x6600
95   | #define CTRL_F10    0x6700
96   | #define CTRL_F11    0x8900
97   | #define CTRL_F12    0x8A00
98   | 					      
99   | #define ALT_F1      0x6800
100  | #define ALT_F2      0x6900
101  | #define ALT_F3      0x6A00
102  | #define ALT_F4      0x6B00
103  | #define ALT_F5      0x6C00
104  | #define ALT_F6      0x6D00
105  | #define ALT_F7      0x6E00
106  | #define ALT_F8      0x6F00
107  | #define ALT_F9      0x7000
108  | #define ALT_F10     0x7100
109  | #define ALT_F11     0x8B00
110  | #define ALT_F12     0x8C00
